name: XWUI Popover Component
description: Popover component that displays content on hover or click. Supports various placements, alignment options, arrow indicator, and close behaviors. Useful for tooltips, additional information, and interactive overlays.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

placement.description: Placement of the popover relative to trigger

align.description: Alignment of the popover relative to trigger

arrow.description: Whether to show arrow pointing to trigger

closeOnClickOutside.description: Whether to close popover when clicking outside

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the popover

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string for the popover body (required)

triggerElement.description: Trigger element or selector string to attach popover to
